Antibodies found in llamas could prove to be useful in the treatment of COVID-19, an international team of scientists has said.
The researchers have engineered a new antibody, a type of protein produced by animal immune systems that defends against foreign i… [+3480 chars]

articles.description: A total of 277 patients in the country were believed to have fallen ill for a second time, as had patients in China and Japan.
